---
title: "Publications" 
description: |
  This is home for my research publications, each linked with<br>
  accompanying preprints, posters, and/or news pieces.
listing: 
  contents: 
    - "**/index.qmd"
    - "**/index.markdown"
    - "**/index.md"
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  fields: [title, author, categories, date]
  image-align: left
  # image-height: 10em
  # page-size: 5

format: 
  html: 
    page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
citation: false

header-includes: >

  <script src="../assets/custom-category-toggle.js"></script>
  <script>
    // Ensure categories are loaded before our custom script runs

      if (window['quarto-listing-loaded']) {
        window['quarto-listing-loaded']();
      }
    });
  </script>
  <style>
  /* Make publication index page wider and properly centered */
  .page-layout-full,

    max-width: 1400px !important;

    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
    padding-left: 1rem !important;
    padding-right: 1rem !important;
  }
  
  /* Ensure listing content uses full width and is centered */
  .listing,

    max-width: 1400px !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
    padding-left: 1rem !important;
    padding-right: 1rem !important;
  }

    max-width: 1400px !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    margin-left: auto !important;
    margin-right: auto !important;
  }
  
  /* Fix centering for publication pages */
  .page-layout-full .quarto-container {
    margin-left: auto !important;

  }

  }

    padding-right: 1rem !important;
  }
